page.title: SpringSaLaD Reactions
page.introduction: A SpringSaLaD reaction inherits the attributes of a Rule-based species, but must strictly follow the templates of the SpringSaLaD specific categories.
page.appearance:
When using SpringSaLaD reactions, it is important to be aware that:
The reactions are automatically assigned to one of the predefined categories, based on template matching.
The SpringSaLaD reactions have the following limitations:
The reactions are strictly categorized and must follow the template for their category.
